title: Purple phonts for Purple Day
content:
On 26 March, feel free to give your profile pics a purple twist in support of **[Purple](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111845/https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=4bydB3-k-qU) Day**. International epilepsy awareness day. — [http://www.purpleday.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111845/http:/www.purpleday.org/ "http://www.purpleday.org")

Chris
author: Chris Dean

comments.content: hmm, my daughter has epilepsy and I didn't even know about this.
